General.Name: Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and after-sales service of compressors in China. The company's products include air end, refrigerant, scroll, and air compressors, as well as vacuum pumps. It exports its products in approximately 50 countries. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Hanbell Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. in December 2005. Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yuying  Qiu
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Sec. of Board of Directors
